summary: REQ-12/13/15 appear implemented: Report view has PDF/CSV/Print actions, print CSS hides navigation chrome, and All Entries has client-side search, due-today toggle, and sorting. REQ-14 is only partially met because All Entries CSV export appears to export the filtered/sorted subset rather than all loaded entries.

missing_requirements.requirement: All Entries view: an "Export CSV" action downloads a CSV containing all entries currently loaded.
missing_requirements.reason: The All Entries export handler uses `filteredAndSortedEntries` (which is affected by search filter, due-today filter, and sorting) rather than exporting the full `entries` dataset that is currently loaded.

hallucinated_features.description: PDF export dynamically loads jsPDF and jspdf-autotable from external CDNs at runtime.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest asks for client-side PDF export but does not request (or mention) runtime loading from CDNs; the diff implements an additional mechanism that depends on third-party CDN script injection.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer includes an external promotional attribution link to caffeine.ai.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any requirement; appears as added/modified user-facing UI content.
